languages.text: "Стоит закрыть глаза, и безумные цвета поглощенного ересью мира жгут веки. Ужасное зрелище".
"Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."
languages.original_text: "Стоит закрыть глаза, и безумные цвета поглощенного ересью мира жгут веки. Ужасное зрелище".

traits.locale_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."
"Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."
"Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."
"Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."
"Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

languages.text: "Jedes Mal, wenn ich die Augen schließe, brennen in meinen Lidern die quälenden Farben einer Welt, die von der Ketzerei verschlungen wird. Ein furchtbarer Anblick."
languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

traits.locale_text: "Jedes Mal, wenn ich die Augen schließe, brennen in meinen Lidern die quälenden Farben einer Welt, die von der Ketzerei verschlungen wird. Ein furchtbarer Anblick."

languages.text: « Chaque fois que je ferme les yeux, mes paupières sont assaillies par les couleurs démentes d'un monde consumé par l'hérésie. Funeste spectacle s'il en est. »
languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

traits.locale_text: « Chaque fois que je ferme les yeux, mes paupières sont assaillies par les couleurs démentes d'un monde consumé par l'hérésie. Funeste spectacle s'il en est. »

languages.text: «Cada vez que cierro los ojos, mis párpados arden con los colores enloquecedores de un mundo consumido por la herejía. Es un espectáculo terrible».
languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

traits.locale_text: «Cada vez que cierro los ojos, mis párpados arden con los colores enloquecedores de un mundo consumido por la herejía. Es un espectáculo terrible».

languages.text: 「目を閉じるたび、まぶたが異端に蝕まれた世界の狂おしい色に燃えています。見るも恐ろしい光景です」
languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

traits.locale_text: 「目を閉じるたび、まぶたが異端に蝕まれた世界の狂おしい色に燃えています。見るも恐ろしい光景です」

languages.text: “每当我闭上眼睛，我的眼睑就仿佛在灼烧一样，显现出令人发狂的色彩，来自那个异端吞噬的世界。那样的景象实在是太可怕了。”
languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

traits.locale_text: “每当我闭上眼睛，我的眼睑就仿佛在灼烧一样，显现出令人发狂的色彩，来自那个异端吞噬的世界。那样的景象实在是太可怕了。”

languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."

languages.text: "Gözlerimi her kapattığımda kâfirliğe kurban giden bir dünyanın çıldırtıcı renkleriyle göz kapaklarım yanıyor. Seyretmesi korkunç bir görüntü."
languages.original_text: "Every time I close my eyes, my eyelids burn with the maddening colours of a world consumed by heresy. A terrible sight to behold."
